post.value:
We’re looking for a proactive Design Lead to the team. You have a strong foundation in graphic design with a passion for creating compelling brand experiences.


Nuts and bolts:

  • You have 6-8 years of experience building brand identity systems and executing across platforms. 
  • You have excellent drawing and typographic skills and are highly proficient in Adobe Creative Suite.
  • You’re a confident and persuasive communicator with the ability to speak to your work and make intelligent design decisions.
